QuestData.Title: Standards of the Swarm
QuestData.Description:
The brazen mantid think they've already won. Even now, they fly banners along the Serpent's Spine, announcing their dominance.
They must learn that Pandaria belongs to the pandaren.
Burn their banners down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Burn $1oa Zara'thik Banners within the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
